sentences.sContent: There was a palpable sense of relief among the crowd.
sentences.sCn: 众人显然都感到如释重负。

synos.tran: 明显的；[医]可感知的；易觉察的

remMethod.val: palp(摸) + able → 摸得到的 → 可触知的

trans.tranCn: 明显的；可感知的；易觉察的
trans.tranOther: a feeling that is palpable is so strong that other people notice it and can feel it around them
